resources.string:
• In this variation of Tic-Tac-Toe, you will use the numbers 1-9.

• Player 1 will play with the odd numbers, and Player 2 will use the even numbers.

• All numbers can only be used once.

• The player who puts down 15 points in a line wins (sum of 3 numbers).

 Good luck!

• In this variation of Tic-Tac-Toe, you will place either an X or an O on each move.

• It can be played as a normal game where three in a row wins, or a misere game where three in a row results in a loss.

 Good luck!

• In this variation of Tic-Tac-Toe, you will place either an S or an O in an empty square.

• The player that creates the sequence SOS in any direction receives a point and gets to take another turn.

• The player with the most points (SOSs) wins!

 Good luck!
